cast.original_title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die
cast.overview: In the wake of King Edward's death, Uhtred of Bebbanburg and his comrades adventure across a fractured kingdom in the hopes of uniting England at last.
cast.title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die

cast.overview: After marrying a successful Parisian writer known commonly as Willy, Sidonie-Gabrielle Colette is transplanted from her childhood home in rural France to the intellectual and artistic splendor of Paris. Soon after, Willy convinces Colette to ghostwrite for him. She pens a semi-autobiographical novel about a witty and brazen country girl named Claudine, sparking a bestseller and a cultural sensation. After its success, Colette and Willy become the talk of Paris and their adventures inspire additional Claudine novels.
cast.title: Colette

cast.overview: A real estate agent leaves behind his beautiful wife to go to Transylvania to visit the mysterious Count Dracula and formalize the purchase of a property in Wismar.
cast.title: Nosferatu the Vampyre

details.biography: Attila Arpa was born on November 17, 1971 in Munich, West Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Atomic Blonde (2017), Red Sparrow (2018) and Inferno (2016).
details.name: Attila Árpa
